statements: SELECT bin_id, location, capacity, last_emptied FROM composting_bins WHERE bin_id = 1;
SELECT location, last_emptied, capacity, bin_id FROM composting_bins WHERE location LIKE 'kitchen%';
SELECT * FROM composting_bins WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY last_emptied DESC;
SELECT bin_id, location FROM composting_bins WHERE last_emptied >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT bin_id, location, capacity FROM composting_bins ORDER BY capacity DESC, location ASC;
SELECT * FROM composting_bins WHERE location = 'Kitchen' ORDER BY last_emptied DESC, capacity ASC;
SELECT bin_id, location, capacity FROM composting_bins WHERE capacity > 10 ORDER BY bin_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM composting_bins WHERE last_emptied BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT bin_id, location FROM composting_bins WHERE location LIKE '%Garden' AND capacity IS NOT NULL;
SELECT bin_id, location, last_emptied FROM composting_bins WHERE last_emptied < '2022-09-01' AND capacity > 5 ORDER BY bin_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM composting_bins;
SELECT bin_name, location FROM composting_bins WHERE bin_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM composting_bins ORDER BY bin_id DESC;
SELECT bin_name, city, country FROM composting_bins JOIN bin_locations ON composting_bins.location = bin_locations.location_name;
SELECT location_name, city FROM bin_locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT bin_id, bin_name, location FROM composting_bins;
SELECT bin_name, location, bin_id FROM composting_bins;
SELECT * FROM composting_bins WHERE location = 'Backyard';
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM bin_locations;
SELECT location_id, location_name, city, country FROM bin_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM composting_bins;
SELECT bin_id, bin_location, bin_capacity FROM composting_bins ORDER BY bin_capacity DESC;
SELECT bin_location, bin_capacity, bin_status FROM composting_bins WHERE bin_status = 'Active';
SELECT bin_id, bin_location, bin_capacity, bin_status FROM composting_bins WHERE bin_capacity < 100;
SELECT * FROM bin_locations WHERE location_country = 'USA';
SELECT bin_id, bin_location, bin_capacity FROM composting_bins;
SELECT location_id, location_name, location_city, location_state FROM bin_locations ORDER BY location_city DESC;
SELECT log_id, bin_id, location_id, collection_date, collected_amount FROM bin_logs WHERE collection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM composting_bins WHERE bin_status = 'Active' AND bin_capacity > 100 ORDER BY bin_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, location_address, location_city, location_state, location_country FROM bin_locations WHERE location_country != 'USA';
SELECT * FROM composting_bins;
SELECT bin_name, capacity FROM composting_bins ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM bin_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT bin_name, capacity FROM composting_bins WHERE bin_id = 3;

SELECT bin_name, location_name, status FROM composting_bins JOIN bin_locations ON composting_bins.location_id = bin_locations.location_id JOIN bin_status ON composting_bins.bin_id = bin_status.bin_id;
SELECT * FROM composting_bins ORDER BY bin_name DESC, bin_id ASC
SELECT bin_name, location_id, capacity FROM composting_bins WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY capacity DESC

SELECT b.bin_id, b.bin_name, bs.status, bh.action FROM composting_bins b LEFT JOIN bin_status bs ON b.bin_id = bs.bin_id LEFT JOIN bin_history bh ON b.bin_id = bh.bin_id WHERE bs.status = 'Active' AND bh.action = 'Emptied'
SELECT b.bin_name, bl.location_name, bl.address FROM composting_bins b JOIN bin_locations bl ON b.location_id = bl.location_id
SELECT b.bin_name, COUNT(bh.history_id) AS num_actions FROM composting_bins b LEFT JOIN bin_history bh ON b.bin_id = bh.bin_id GROUP BY b.bin_name HAVING num_actions > 3 ORDER BY num_actions DESC
SELECT * FROM composting_bins;
SELECT bin_location, bin_capacity FROM composting_bins;
SELECT bin_location, bin_capacity FROM composting_bins WHERE bin_capacity > 500;
SELECT location_name, location_address FROM bin_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT bin_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_description FROM bin_maintenance WHERE bin_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM composting_bins;
SELECT bin_id, bin_location FROM composting_bins WHERE bin_capacity > 100;
SELECT bin_id, bin_location, bin_capacity FROM composting_bins WHERE bin_capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY bin_location DESC;
SELECT cb.bin_id, cb.bin_location, bl.location_name FROM composting_bins cb JOIN bin_locations bl ON cb.bin_id = bl.location_id;

SELECT bm.maintenance_id, cb.bin_id, bl.location_name, bm.maintenance_date FROM bin_maintenance bm JOIN composting_bins cb ON bm.bin_id = cb.bin_id JOIN bin_locations bl ON cb.bin_id = bl.location_id WHERE bm.maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
